data.title: Maniac Cop 2
data.meta_description: 2018 Coolidge After Midnite Award honoree William Lustig joins us forÂ a moderated post-film discussion and award presentation! An undead cop with a vendetta against the NYPD teams with a derelict serial killer in this action packed sequel.
data.text:
2018 Coolidge After Midnite Award honoree William Lustig joins us for a moderated post-film discussion and award presentation!

An undead cop with a vendetta against the NYPD teams with a derelict serial killer in this action packed sequel.

Director William Lustig's Maniac Cop 2 belongs in cinema history books alongside Terminator 2 and The Godfather: Part II as a burning example of how to surpass one's own creative vision. The original Maniac Cop sets up the story for this killer sequel. In that film officer Matt Cordell was set up and executed by a bunch of corrupt New York cops. He escapes death to take his vengeance on the boys in blue. In this second part of the story he does all that and more. Maniac Cop 2 triples the body count of its predecessor, has daring police chases, nudity, Bruce Campbell, more nudity, and more minutes of full body burns than any other film.
